channel.title: blog on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Welcome To My New Blog
item.description: Hello Folks Welcome to my new blog. I decided to move away for a number of reasons, but setting up a static page blog site is very cool if you don’t directly use a database. Since posts are just posts and I have a different way of hosting images, this really was just a matter of time. And Hugo / Github pages provided the tools which made this move possible.

item.title: Welcome To My New Blog
item.description: Hello Folks Welcome to my new blog. I decided to move away for a number of reasons, but setting up a static page blog site is very cool if you don’t directly use a database. Since posts are just posts and I have a different way of hosting images, this really was just a matter of time. And Hugo / Github pages provided the tools which made this move possible.
